title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
Experience the ultimate surf adventure with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch. This rugged smartwatch is designed for surf enthusiasts, featuring dedicated surf features like tide data and a surfing activity profile. It also offers windsurfing and kiteboarding activities, allowing you to measure your GPS position, speed, distance, and heart rate, as well as track elevation for kiteboarding jumps. 

With solar charging capabilities, this watch provides unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode, assuming all-day wear with just 3 hours of direct sunlight exposure in 50,000 lux conditions. In GPS mode, it can last up to 48 hours with continuous solar charging in direct sunlight. 

Stay connected and never miss a beat with smart notifications and compatibility with Garmin Pay and Connect IQ when paired with your compatible smartphone. The Instinct 2 Solar also works seamlessly with Surfline Sessions, creating a video of every wave you ride in front of a Surfline camera, so you can relive your surfing moments and analyze your performance. 

But the features don't stop there. This smartwatch also comes with built-in sports apps for running, biking, strength training, and more, allowing you to track your activities with precision. It includes a 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and multiple global navigation satellite systems (GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo) to ensure accurate tracking and navigation on your adventures. 

Furthermore, the Instinct 2 Solar offers all-day health monitoring features, tracking your heart rate, sleep, Pulse Ox (not available in all countries), respiration, and more. This rugged GPS smartwatch is water-rated to 100 meters and built to withstand thermal and shock, thanks to its fiber-reinforced polymer case and scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass. 

Don't just ride the wave, own it with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch. Unlock new possibilities and enhance your surf experience with this powerful and reliable companion.

Experience the ultimate surfing adventure with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch. This rugged smartwatch is designed specifically for surfers, with features like tide data and a surfing activity profile, allowing you to track the number of waves surfed, maximum speed, and distance. It also includes windsurfing and kiteboarding activities, so you can measure your GPS position, speed, distance, and heart rate, as well as monitor elevation for kiteboarding jumps.

The Instinct 2 Solar features solar charging capabilities, giving you unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode with just 3 hours of direct sunlight per day in 50,000 lux conditions. No need to worry about running out of power while you're out on the water. Additionally, this smartwatch works with Surfline Sessions, allowing you to create videos of every wave you ride in front of a Surfline camera, so you can review and analyze your performance later.

Not just limited to surfing, the Instinct 2 Solar also includes built-in sports apps for running, biking, strength training, and more. Stay connected with smart notifications and Connect IQ compatibility when paired with your compatible smartphone. Plus, with its 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and multiple global navigation satellite systems (GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo), you can track your adventures and explore new routes with ease.

With all-day health monitoring features, such as heart rate tracking, sleep monitoring, Pulse Ox, and more, you can gain a better understanding of your body's needs and performance. This rugged smartwatch is water-rated to 100 meters and built to withstand thermal and shock resistance, thanks to its fiber-reinforced polymer case and scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass.

Take your surfing to the next level and own every wave with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch.

With preloaded activity profiles for running, biking, swimming, and more, you can pursue all your favorite sports. Stay connected with smart notifications, Garmin Pay, and Connect IQ compatibility when paired with your smartphone. The watch even works with Surfline Sessions, capturing video footage of every wave you ride in front of a Surfline camera. With solar charging capabilities, this watch provides unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode, assuming all-day wear and 3 hours of direct sunlight in 50,000 lux conditions. In GPS mode, it can last up to 48 hours with continuous solar charging in direct sunlight. You won't have to worry about running out of power while enjoying your water adventures.

generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

---

Title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM

Description: Go longer than ever with solar charging that gives you unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode (assuming all-day wear with 3 hours per day outside in 50,000 lux conditions)

Battery life: in smartwatch mode, unlimited with solar charging in 3 hours of direct sunlight (50,000 lux) per day; in GPS mode, up to 48 hours with solar charging continuously in direct sunlight (50,000 lux)

Record the number of waves surfed, maximum speed and distance by using the surf activity profile; tide data lets you stay up to date on ocean conditions

Windsurfing and kiteboarding activities let you measure your GPS position, speed, distance and heart rate; plus, see elevation for your kiteboarding jumps

Works with Surfline Sessions, which creates a video of every wave you ride in front a Surfline camera, so you can watch them later and see how you did

Built-in sports apps for running, biking, strength training and more

Live the ultimate connected life with smart notifications and Connect IQ compatibility when paired with your compatible smartphone.


   Track your adventures with the built-in 3-axis compass and barometric altimeter, plus multiple global navigation satellite systems (GPS, GLONASS and Galileo) Understand your body better with all-day health monitoring features that track your heart rate, sleep, Pulse Ox, respiration and more (Pulse Ox not available in all countries. This device is intended to give an estimation of your activity and metrics; it is not a medical device) Rugged GPS smartwatch is water-rated to 100 meters and thermal- and shock resistant with fiber-reinforced polymer case and scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass   Show more

Why just ride a wave? Own it with Instinct® 2 Solar – Surf Edition. This rugged GPS smartwatch has dedicated surf features — such as tide data and a surfing activity—and windsurfing and kiteboarding activities. Plus, solar charging gives you unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode (assuming all-day wear with 3 hours per day outside in 50,000 lux conditions), so you don’t have to leave the water until you’re ready. Do more of what you love with preloaded activity profiles for running, biking, swimming, strength training and more. When paired with a compatible device, live the ultimate connected life with smart notifications, Garmin Pay™ and Connect IQ™ compatibility. This watch even works with Surfline Sessions™, which creates a video of every wave you ride in front a Surfline camera, so you can watch them later and see how you did. Understand your body better with all-day health monitoring for energy levels, stress, sleep, Pulse Ox and much more (Pulse Ox not available in all countries. This device is intended to give an estimation of your activity and metrics; it is not a medical device).
